Package de.fuberlin.wiwiss.ng4j.semwebclient.urisearch

Interface Summary
QueryProcessor Prepares and executes the query of a URI search.
URISearchListener A listener that handles URISearchResult.
 

Class Summary
HTTPbasedQueryProcessor A base class for all query processors that use a HTTP based API which returns RDF documents.
QueryProcessorSindice A query processor for the Sindice search engine.
URISearchResult The result of a URISearchTask.
URISearchTask A task to search for RDF documents that mention a specific URI.
URISearchTaskQueue A queue of URI search tasks (URISearchTask objects) that manages threads (URISearchThread objects) which execute the queued tasks.
URISearchThread A thread that executes a URISearchTask.
 

Exception Summary
QueryProcessingException An exception that occured during praparation or execution of a URI search query.
